fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Class Processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.Processor

  • public abstract class Processor
extends java.lang.Object
    Processor class handle request call via HttpRequestHandler. It manages pre-process and post-process logic . Pre-process and post-process are defined as hooks in order to defined specific logics for you're application
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Processor.RESTServiceCallback
      Binder callback for RestService

                                    java.io.InputStream resultStream)

      • mirrorServerState

        protected void mirrorServerState(RESTRequest<ResourceRepresentation<?>> r)
        Mirrors the server state before the request is executed. Sets the transacting flag of ResourceRepresentation to true and the RequestState based on HTTPVerb :

        • HTTPVerb.POST : RequestState.STATE_POSTING
        • HTTPVerb.PUT : RequestState.STATE_UPDATING
        • HTTPVerb.DELETE : RequestState.STATE_DELETING

        Parameters:
        r - The actual RESTRequest

      • updateLocalResource

        protected int updateLocalResource(int statusCode,
                      RESTRequest<ResourceRepresentation<?>> r,
                      java.io.InputStream resultStream)
        Updates the local resource to mirror the server state after the request is executed. Sets the transacting flag to false, updates the result code. When deleting a resource, this resource is not deleted from local database until the DELETE request has succeed. When a GET request is finished and succeed, old local resource is first deleted before re-added in database.
        Parameters:
        statusCode - The status code resulting of request
        r - The actual RESTRequest
        resultStream - The server's response
        Returns:
        The updated (or not) status code

      • getResourceDao

        protected DaoAccess<ResourceRepresentation<?>> getResourceDao(ResourceRepresentation<?> r)
        Shortcut to retrieve Dao from Processor via DaoFactory
        Parameters:
        r - The ResourceRepresentation you want the dao
        Returns:
        Instance of DaoAccess

      • isRemotelySync

        public static boolean isRemotelySync(ResourceRepresentation<?> r)
        Provides a way to know if a specific ResourceRepresentation is remotely sync or not.
        Parameters:
        r - The ResourceRepresentation you wan to know if it's remotely synchronized
        Returns:
        True if the resource is actually synchronized with the server, false otherwise

      • checkRequest

        public boolean checkRequest(RESTRequest<? extends ResourceRepresentation<?>> request)
        Handles caching logic. This method can be implemented in specific Processor to always return true in order to avoid caching. TODO Has to be delegate to a CacheManager and handle refresh with timestamp
        Parameters:
        request - The actual ResourceRepresentation
        Returns:
        False if the request has to be resent, true otherwise

      • parseToObject

        protected <R extends ResourceRepresentation<?>> R parseToObject(java.io.InputStream content,
                                                    java.lang.Class<R> clazz)
                                                  throws fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.exceptions.ParsingException
        Shortcut to parse an InputStream to object from Processor via retrieving the Parser thanks to ParserFactory
        Parameters:
        content - The data you want to parse
        clazz - The Class object of the ResourceRepresentation you want to be mapped
        Returns:
        An instance of ResourceRepresentation
